{"id":935584909,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1681791194,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"73 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/935584909/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"45.3 MB","code":"/**\n * @param {number} n\n * @return {boolean}\n */\nfunction isHappy(n) {\n    let [slow, fast] = [n, sumOfSquares(n)]\n    while (true) {\n        if (fast === 1) return true\n        if (slow === fast) return false\n        ;[slow, fast] = [sumOfSquares(slow), sumOfSquares(sumOfSquares(fast))]\n    }\n}\nfunction sumOfSquares(n) {\n    return n === 0 \n        ? 0 \n        : (n % 10) ** 2 + sumOfSquares(Math.floor(n / 10))\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
